text: Aur jiss din kafir jahannum kay siray per layen jayen gay (kaha jayega) tum ney apni nekiyan duniya ki zindagi mein hi barbaad kerdin aur inn say faeedah utha chukay pus aaj tumhen zillat kay azab ki saza di jayegi iss baees kay tum zamin mein na-haq takabbur kiya kertay thay aur iss baees bhi kay tum hukum adooli kiya kertay thay
